name: StayFree - Website Blocker & Screen Time Tracker
summary: Owned by Sensor Tower. Embeds Pathmatics ad intelligence SDK that hooks XHR/fetch to intercept ALL HTTP responses for ad scraping. Collects AI conversation metadata from ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, Copilot, DeepSeek, Perplexity, Grok. Scrapes 30+ customer service chatbot widgets. Uploads browsing data, page views, URL query parameters, and retail ad data to stayfreeapps.com. Pre-checked consent checkboxes.

vulnerabilities.title: XHR/Fetch Interception for Ad Intelligence Scraping
vulnerabilities.description: Sensor Tower Pathmatics SDK hooks XMLHttpRequest.prototype.send and window.fetch to intercept ALL HTTP responses on pages for ad creative harvesting.

vulnerabilities.title: AI Conversation Metadata and Content Exfiltration
vulnerabilities.description: Scrapes ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, Copilot, DeepSeek, Perplexity, Grok conversations. Uploads metadata, URLs from AI responses, and interaction card content to stayfreeapps.com.

vulnerabilities.title: Customer Service Chatbot Content Scraping
vulnerabilities.description: Detects and scrapes conversations from 30+ chatbot widgets (Intercom, Zendesk, Drift, etc.) including actual chat content.

vulnerabilities.title: Browsing History and Search Query Collection
vulnerabilities.description: Uploads per-website session durations, page view timestamps, referrers, ad network attribution, and URL search parameters.

vulnerabilities.title: Remote Configuration Enables Server-Controlled Behavior
vulnerabilities.description: Server can remotely toggle browsing data uploads, update AI chat scraping selectors, modify collection targets without extension update.

flags.description: Pathmatics SDK hooks XMLHttpRequest.prototype.send and window.fetch globally to intercept all HTTP responses
window.fetch replaced to clone and read all responses with text/JSON/XML content types
Uploads browsing data, AI conversation metadata, chatbot conversations, page views, and URL query parameters to stayfreeapps.com
Remote config from stayfreeapps.com can toggle data uploads, update AI scraping selectors, and modify collection behavior
